channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Supreme Court hears case about emergency abortion care
item.description: The Supreme Court heard oral arguments in another major abortion access case as it grapples with the aftermath of reversing Roe v. Wade. Follow here for live audio of the arguments, news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: Some Republicans join Arizona Dems in vote to repeal controversial 1864 abortion ban
item.description: The Arizona House voted on Wednesday to repeal the state's controversial 1864 abortion ban

item.title: Tensions rise as protests on college campuses continue nationwide
item.description: Columbia University and other schools have taken steps to try to address students' concerns over safety and freedom of expression. Follow for live news updates.

item.title: More than 1 in 4 US adults over age 50 say they expect to never retire: AARP study
item.description: About one-quarter of U.S. adults age 50 and older who aren't yet retired say they expect to never retire and 70% are concerned about prices rising faster than their income

item.title: Devastation in Gaza as Israel wages war on Hamas
item.description: Hamas on Wednesday released a video of Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin, the first proof that he survived being badly wounded during his capture on October 7. Follow for live updates

item.title: US Rep. Donald Payne Jr. dies at 65 after a heart attack
item.description: Officials say U.S. Rep. Donald Payne Jr. of New Jersey has died after a heart attack this month that left him hospitalized

item.title: David Beckham Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about David Beckham, and learn more about the life of the retired soccer legend.

item.title: Trump is unindicted co-conspirator in Michigan fake elector case, hearing reveals
item.description: Former President Donald Trump is among several unindicted co-conspirators in the Michigan AG's case against the state's "fake electors," an investigator has revealed.

item.title: Billy Joel Fast Facts
item.description: View CNN's Fast Facts on Billy Joel and learn more about the muscian called the "Piano Man."

item.title: Woman is 1st patient to undergo combined heart pump implant and pig kidney transplant
item.description: In a first-of-its-kind procedure, a terminally ill New Jersey woman received a pig kidney transplant and a surgically implanted mechanical heart pump.
